    • Method Detail

      • polyfit

        public static double[] polyfit(double[] x,
                               double[] y,
                               int degree)
        Least squares polynomial fit. Fits a polynomial p(x) = p[0] * x**deg + ... + p[deg] of degree deg to points (x, y). Returns a vector of coefficients p that minimises the squared error.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinates of the sample points (M sample points).
        y - y-coordinates of the sample points (M sample points).
        degree - Degree of the fitting polynomial.
        Returns:
        Polynomial coefficients, highest power first.

      • polyval

        public static double[] polyval(double[] p,
                               double[] x)
        Evaluate a polynomial at specific values.
        Parameters:
        p - Polynomial coefficients (highest degree first).
        x - Points at which to evaluate.
        Returns:
        Evaluated values.

      • polyder

        public static double[] polyder(double[] p)
        Compute the derivative of a polynomial.
        Parameters:
        p - Polynomial coefficients (highest degree first).
        Returns:
        Derivative polynomial coefficients.

      • polyval

        public static double polyval(double[] p,
                             double x)
        Evaluate a polynomial at a specific value using Horner's method.
        Parameters:
        p - Polynomial coefficients (highest degree first).
        x - Point at which to evaluate.
        Returns:
        Evaluated value.
